name: Make-ahead Cheesy Joe's
author: Beth Zelle
summary: Delicious sandwiches you make ahead, wrap, freeze and just pop in the oven when ready to serve.  Great for Super Bowl Parties!  These are cheesy, toasty and delicious!
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) jar sweet pickle relish, drained
2 (15 ounce) jars processed cheese sauce (such as Cheez Whiz®)
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and stir in the ground beef and onion
Cook and stir until the beef is crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink
Drain and discard any excess grease
Spread processed cheese sauce on each bun half, place a scoop of the meat mixture between the halves
Wrap each sandwich in foil and refrigerate or freeze until needed
Bake in an oven preheated to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) until hot, 5 to 10 minutes if refrigerated, 20 minutes if frozen
